keyword: how many calories in a plantain
title: How Many Calories in a Plantain?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a plantain with full nutrition breakdown, including carbs, fiber, and tweaks for cooking methods, based on a medium raw serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Plantain?
assumptions: One medium raw plantain (about 179 g edible portion), green to ripe stage, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by ripeness, size, variety, and preparation method. Check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium raw plantain provides about 218 kcal and 57 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a raw plantain?
faqs.a: About 218 kcal for one medium raw plantain.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a plantain?
faqs.a: Roughly 57 g carbs, including 4.1 g fiber and 26.9 g sugars per medium plantain.

faqs.q: Are plantains high in protein or fat?
faqs.a: Lowâ€”only 2.3 g protein and 0.7 g fat per medium plantain.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in a plantain?
faqs.a: Boiling keeps calories similar; frying adds 100+ kcal from oil.

faqs.q: Is a plantain better than a banana nutritionally?
faqs.a: Plantains have more carbs and fiber but similar calories; ripeness increases sugars.
